Write down the output of the given programs. Show with dry run in a table. [2] DECLARE SUB Display(S$)​ CLS​ S$="TOEPOHSDRA"​ CALL Display (S$)​ END SUB Display(S$)​ LET I=48​ FOR C=1 TO 4​ P=I MOD 7​ R$=R$+ MID$(S$, P, 1)​ I=I-1​ NEXT C​ PRINT R$​ END SUB

[2] DECLARE FUNCTION Calculate (X,Y)​ CLS​ INPUT "Enter a multi-digit number"; N​ LET S = Calculate (N,T)​ PRINT "The sum ="; S​ END FUNCTION Calculate (X,Y)​ WHILE X < > 0​ R=X MOD 10​ Y = Y + R​ X=X\10​ WEND​ Calculate = Y​ END FUNCTION Questions:
